content: one of the stitch marker sts and remove marker single_crochet in next 12 sts repeat r24-r26 stuff leg and cut a long tail sew hole closed use remaining tail to sew hole between legs arms r1 - single_crochet 8 in magic_ring 8 r2-r7 - single_crochet in each st around 8 cut yarn leaving a long tail stuff arm lightly and sew between r15 and r17 of the body repeat process to make the other arm enjoy your new pocket guy stay tuned for accessory patterns and even custom character designs if you have any suggestions please let me know
